thread.title: Teen locked in juvenile hall in limbo for months, family says
thread.title_full: Teen locked in juvenile hall in limbo for months, family says - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Vivian Ho
title: Teen locked in juvenile hall in limbo for months, family says
text:
Photo: Lea Suzuki, The Chronicle The uncle of a 15-year-old who has been held in juvenile hall for months stands silhouetted in his brother's home as he talks with a reporter. The uncle of a 15-year-old who has been held in juvenile hall for...
In the span of time most boys his age have graduated from middle school and gotten a driving permit, one teen has been locked up at San Francisco juvenile hall — and his loved ones blame unreasonable administrators who have failed to find him a suitable group home. The uncle of a 15-year-old who has been held in juvenile hall for months stands silhouetted in his brother's home as he talks with a reporter. The uncle of a 15-year-old who has been held in juvenile hall for...
In the span of time most boys his age have graduated from middle school and gotten a driving permit, one teen has been locked up at San Francisco juvenile hall — and his loved ones blame unreasonable administrators who have failed to find him a suitable group home.
